<SectionDefinition>

## Private Member Functions

### getAssumedSimplifiedValue() {#a42ad15374c4921b26136dcc714959743}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual std::optional&lt; Value &#42; &gt; llvm::AAValueSimplify::getAssumedSimplifiedValue (<a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor">Attributor</a> &amp; A) const</>}>
Return an assumed simplified value if a single candidate is found.

If there cannot be one, return original value. If it is not clear yet, return std::nullopt.

<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/use">Use</a> <code><a href="/docs/api/structs/llvm/attributor/#a55d76a2640e6d82014e150608631667d">Attributor::getAssumedSimplified</a></code> for value simplification.

Definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h/#l04543">4543</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/transforms/include/llvm/transforms/ipo/attributor-h">Attributor.h</a>.
</MemberDefinition>

</SectionDefinition>
